title: Nadezhda Kharchenko
text:
Nadezhda Kharchenko (born 27 March 1987) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="women%27s%20soccer">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>, who played for <a href="FC%20Zorky%20Krasnogorsk%20%28women%29">Zorky Krasnogorsk</a> in the <a href="Russian%20women%27s%20football%20championship">Russian Championship</a>.
She is a member of the <a href="Russia%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Russian national team</a>, and took part in the <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Euro%202009">2009 European Championship</a>. As an Under-19 international she won the <a href="2005%20UEFA%20Women%27s%20Under-19%20Championship">2005 U-19 Euro</a>.
